dataSetInformation.common:synonyms: Cobalt(II) sulfate; Cobaltous sulfate; Cobaltous sulphate; Cobalt sulphate; Sulfuric acid, cobalt(2+) salt; Cobalt sulfate heptahydrate when talking about its hydrate form; Cobaltsalt of sulfuric acid; Brand names and alternative names may vary based on the manufacturer or brand.

Cobalt(II) sulfate; Cobaltous sulfate; Cobaltous sulphate; Cobalt sulphate; Sulfuric acid, cobalt(2+) salt; Cobalt sulfate heptahydrate when talking about its hydrate form; Cobaltsalt of sulfuric acid; Brand names and alternative names may vary based on the manufacturer or brand.
dataSetInformation.CASNumber: 10124-43-3 for cobalt sulfate heptahydrate, 7758-94-3 for anhydrous cobalt sulfate
dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: Cobalt sulfate is a chemical compound that exists as a red monoclinic crystal or amorphous powder. It is soluble in water and methanol. Cobalt sulfate is typically used in electroplating, as a drier in paints and inks, in animal feed, and in lithium-ion batteries. It's produced via hydrometallurgical extraction from cobalt ores or as a byproduct of copper and nickel mining, often as the heptahydrate form. It can be part of a production mix at a chemical plant or made available to consumers in various grades and packaging formats.
硫酸钴是一种化学化合物，以红色单斜晶体或无定形粉末存在。它可溶于水和甲醇。硫酸钴通常用于电镀，在油漆和墨水中作干燥剂，在动物饲料中使用，并用于锂离子电池中。它通过钴矿的湿法冶金提取生产，或作为铜和镍采翻的副产品，通常以七水合物形式。它可以是化学厂生产混合物的一部分，或以不同等级和包装格式提供给消费者。
dataSetInformation.sumFormula: CoSO4 for anhydrous cobalt sulfate, CoSO4·7H2O for cobalt sulfate heptahydrate
